title: How to 100% Guarantee Success in Anything, with Andy Frisella - MFCEO202
itunes:title: How to 100% Guarantee Success in Anything, with Andy Frisella - MFCEO202
description: Can you 100% guarantee success in anything? Yes. And it doesn’t mean that you have to work so many hours that you never sleep.  What it does mean is that you identify the critical tasks that have to be completed TODAY. There’s no better day than the first day of the new year to review the system – the tool – that has helped me complete critical tasks and become rich and successful. If you faithfully and consistently use the tool, you can become rich and successful, too.
